member.name: T:SharpGLTF.Runtime.AnimatableProperty`1
member.summary: Defines an animatable property with a default value and a collection of animation curve tracks.
member.typeparam: A type that can be interpolated with

member.name: P:SharpGLTF.Runtime.AnimatableProperty`1.Value
member.summary: Gets the default value of this instance. When animations are disabled, or there's no animation track available, this will be the returned value.

member.name: M:SharpGLTF.Runtime.AnimatableProperty`1.GetValueAt(System.Int32,System.Single)
member.summary: Evaluates the value of this at a given for a given .
member.param: The index of the animation track.
The time offset within the curve
member.returns: The evaluated value taken from the animation , or if a track was not found.

member.name: M:SharpGLTF.Runtime.AnimatableProperty`1.SetCurve(System.Int32,SharpGLTF.Animations.ICurveSampler{`0})
member.summary: Sets the animation curves for this property.
member.param: The index of the animation track.
A curve sampler, or null if the curve is to be removed.

member.name: T:SharpGLTF.Runtime.ArmatureInstance
member.summary: Represents the transform states of a collection of bones.

member.summary: Gets a flattened collection of all the nodes of this armature.

member.name: P:SharpGLTF.Runtime.ArmatureInstance.VisualNodes
member.summary: Gets all the roots used by this .

member.name: P:SharpGLTF.Runtime.ArmatureInstance.AnimationTracks
member.summary: Gets the total number of animation tracks for this instance.

member.summary: Sets the matrix of a bone.
member.param: The name of the node to be set.
A matrix relative to its parent bone.

member.name: M:SharpGLTF.Runtime.ArmatureInstance.SetModelMatrix(System.String,System.Numerics.Matrix4x4)
member.summary: Sets the matrix of a bone.
member.param: The name of the node to be set.
A matrix relative to the model.

member.name: M:SharpGLTF.Runtime.ArmatureInstance.SetPoseTransforms
member.summary: Resets the bone transforms to their default positions.

member.name: M:SharpGLTF.Runtime.ArmatureInstance.SetAnimationFrame(System.Int32,System.Single,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sets the bone transforms from an animation frame.
member.param: True to use the animation as a looped animation.

members.member:
Represents a flattened collection of nodes/joints/bones, which define a Skeleton when correlated.
/// Only the nodes used by a given will be copied. Also, nodes will be reordered so children nodes always come after their parents (for fast evaluation), so it's important to keep in mind that indices will differ from those in .

member.name: M:SharpGLTF.Runtime.ArmatureTemplate.Create(SharpGLTF.Schema2.Scene,SharpGLTF.Runtime.RuntimeOptions)
member.summary: Creates a new based on the nodes of .
member.param: The source from where to take the nodes.

member.name: P:SharpGLTF.Runtime.ArmatureTemplate.Nodes
member.summary: Gets the flattened list of nodes, ordered so parents appear before children.

member.name: P:SharpGLTF.Runtime.ArmatureTemplate.Materials
member.summary: Gets the list of materials used by the meshes of this model

member.name: P:SharpGLTF.Runtime.ArmatureTemplate.Tracks
member.summary: Gets the animations tracks info.

member.summary: Exposes an API to get geometry data from a mesh primitive

member.name: P:SharpGLTF.Runtime.IMeshPrimitiveDecoder.VertexCount
member.summary: Gets a value indicating the total number of vertices for this primitive.

member.name: P:SharpGLTF.Runtime.IMeshPrimitiveDecoder.MorphTargetsCount
member.summary: Gets a value indicating the total number of morph targets for this primitive.

member.name: P:SharpGLTF.Runtime.IMeshPrimitiveDecoder.ColorsCount
member.summary: Gets a value indicating the number of color vertex attributes. In the range of 0 to 2.

member.name: P:SharpGLTF.Runtime.IMeshPrimitiveDecoder.TexCoordsCount
member.summary: Gets a value indicating the number of texture coordinate vertex attributes. In the range of 0 to 2.

member.name: P:SharpGLTF.Runtime.IMeshPrimitiveDecoder.JointsWeightsCount
member.summary: Gets a value indicating the number of skinning joint-weight attributes. The values can be 0, 4 or 8.

member.name: P:SharpGLTF.Runtime.IMeshPrimitiveDecoder.LineIndices
member.summary: Gets a sequence of tuples where each item represents the vertex indices of a line.

member.name: P:SharpGLTF.Runtime.IMeshPrimitiveDecoder.TriangleIndices
member.summary: Gets a sequence of tuples where each item represents the vertex indices of a triangle.

member.summary: Gets the color for the given vertex.

member.summary: Gets the skin weights for the given vertex.

member.summary: Gets the sequence of position deltas for the given vertex. (morph targets)
member.returns: A collection of position deltas, one delta per morph target.

member.summary: Gets the sequence of color deltas for the given vertex. (morph targets)

member.name: P:SharpGLTF.Runtime.RuntimeOptions.IsolateMemory
member.summary: True if we want to copy buffers data instead of sharing it.
member.remarks: If we want to create a runtime representation of the model, so the garbage collector will release the source model, we have to set this to true, so we will not use any reference to the source model.

member.name: P:SharpGLTF.Runtime.RuntimeOptions.GpuMeshInstancing
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether GPU instancing is enabled or disabled.
member.remarks:
When true, if a gltf mesh has gpu instancing elements, they will be converted
internally to the runtime as elements.

member.name: P:SharpGLTF.Runtime.RuntimeOptions.ExtrasConverterCallback
member.summary: Gets or sets the custom extras converter.
